food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of sunshine.
🍌 Monkeys love me!
👣 You peel me before you eat me.

food.question: I am white and cold. I am yummy in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm very cold.
🍦 You eat me with a spoon or in a cone.
👅 I come in many flavors!

food.question: I am round and red. I grow on trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am a fruit.
🌳 I grow on a tree.
🔴 I am often red, but can also be green or yellow.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐇 Bunnies enjoy me.
🧡 I am the same color as a pumpkin.

food.question: I am long and green. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am a vegetable.
🥗 I am good in salads.
🟢 I am often eaten with dips.

food.question: I am small and round. I grow in bunches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am a fruit.
🪴 I grow on vines.
💜 I can be green, red, or purple.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐄 Cows give me.
🥣 I am good with cereal.

food.question: I am orange and juicy. I have a peel. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I am a fruit.
🌍 I grow in warm places
🔪 You have to peel my skin off before eating.

food.question: I am brown and grow underground. You can mash me and make fries. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I am a vegetable.
🌱 I grow in the dirt.
🍟 You can make yummy fries out of me.

food.question: I am yellow and sweet. Bees make me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I am very sticky.
🐝 Bees love to make me.
🐻 Winnie the Pooh loves to eat me.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes you eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need sunshine and water.
🥕 Rabbits like to eat me.
🥗 I can be crunchy or soft.

plant.question: I am big and have leaves. Birds like to sit in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have a strong trunk.
🍃 My leaves change color in the fall.
🏡 Squirrels like to live in me.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I grow in gardens.
🌸 I can be red, yellow, or blue.
💌 People give me as gifts.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I have seeds inside.
🥪 I am good on sandwiches.
☀️ I grow best in the summer.

plant.question: I am round and red and grow on a plant. I am sweet and juicy. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often used in sauces.
🌿 I grow on a vine, and some people think I'm a vegetable!
☀️ I get redder in the sun.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I fall from the tree in the autumn.
🐿️ Squirrels hide me for the winter.
🔨 You need to crack me open to eat what's inside.

plant.question: I am tall and strong, with green needles and a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 People decorate me for Christmas.
🌿 I stay green all year long.
🐿️ Squirrels like to eat my seeds inside my cone.

plant.question: I am yellow and grow in a big field. You can eat me on the cob. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 Chickens also like to eat me.
🚜 Farmers grow lots of me!
🍿 You can pop me to make a yummy snack.

plant.question: I have a brown stem and big green leaves. You can make a yummy drink from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 You can boil my dried leaves.
☕ I can be drunk hot or cold.
🍋 I am delicious with lemon.

plant.question: I'm a plant that grows underground. I'm brown on the outside and white inside, and you can make yummy fries from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 You can mash me up, too.
🍟 I am very good with ketchup.
🌱 You plant special 'eyes' to grow me.
